name: a dream of you [Zhongli x Venti Fangame R18]
name_original: a dream of you [Zhongli x Venti Fangame R18]
description:
Rex Lapis and his first stir of love.

.

.

.

A fangame for Zhongli x Venti pairing from Genshin Impact. Can be installed immediately on mobile/tab for Android. For IOS users, please refer to the guide below.

- A kinetic novel (around 45 minutes playthrough)

- Pairing is Zhongli x Venti from Genshin Impact. IT IS R18 NSFW.

- Beware of how self-indulgent the story is. This is from Zhongven fan for Zhongven fans. 

- I put a price to control the spread because it is R18. The payment will be done for more game assets (more venti-loving, yay!!!)

>>>>>>>>IOS GUIDE

 - install KochoVN app! 

- download the .kocho file 

 - just plug the file in that app, you can play immediately with ease^^
